timeline.message:
Implement SSZ state retrieval on `/eth/v1/debug/beacon/states/:state_id`

 - if accept-header `application/octet-stream` is passed, then SSZ will be returned, otherwise JSON will be returned if the accept header is empty or set to `application/json`.

 - this functionality was previously available on `/teku/v1/beacon/states/:state_id`, which has been deprecated in favor of the standard api implementation.

fixes #3411

Signed-off-by: Paul Harris <paul.harris@consensys.net>
